question: [Note] Nederlands: Geef which category has the highest bar vanuit het staafdiagram.

qas.question: [Note] Nederlands: Geef which category has the highest bar vanuit het staafdiagram.
[Note] Espanol: Indica which category has the lowest bar del grafico de barras.
